Tool

NameClip Grid with Polygon
ID7
Authorcopyrights (c) 2006 Stefan Liersch
Specificationgrid

Description

Clips the input grid with a polygon shapefile. Select polygons from the shapefile prior to module execution in case you like to use only a subset from the shapefile for clipping.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Input Grid list (input)INPUT
Polygons Shapes (input)POLYGONS
Output
OutputGrid list (output)OUTPUT
Options
Exclude No-Data AreaBooleanNODATADefault: 0
